job.title: Embedded Software Engineer - C/C++/Microcontrollers
job.description:
If you are a Embedded Software Engineer - C/C++/Microcontrollers with experience, please read on!
Top Reasons to Work with Us
Terrific benefits and compensation package
Wonderful company culture and a great mission that everyone can get behind
Growing company where career opportunities abound!
Great family and fun culture
What You Will Be Doing
The Embedded Software Engineer will be developing embedded software for advanced medical devices. General responsibilities to include:
Contribute to all phases of the SDLC
Generate task estimates, requirement specifications, and documentation
Analysis and design
Determine technical approaches to coding requirements
Generate and maintain software documentation
Contribute to existing architecture
What You Need for this Position
Qualified candidates will possess as much of the following experience as possible:
Bachelors degree in Computer Science/Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or relevant STEM field
2+ yrs of professional embedded software development experience
Strong grasp of 8-bit microprocessors
Strong grasp of microcontroller architecture
Strong experience developing in C
Strong experience developing in C++
Strong grasp of OOP design concepts
Previous experience with defect tracking tools and configuration management
Previous experience debugging in microcontroller environments
Special Consideration For Candidates With
Masters degree in Computer Science/Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or relevant STEM field
Previous experience in highly regulated environments (FDA, ISO, etc)
Experience developing software for low power applications
Experience with communication protocols like Bluetooth
Experience with medical devices and/or medical hardware
What's In It for You
Competitive base salary
Vacation/PTO
Medical
Dental
Vision
Relocation Assistance
401(k) with a match
So, if you are a Embedded Software Engineer - C/C++/Microcontrollers with experience, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Melanie.McElwee@CyberCoders.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : JP13-1616809 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Melanie McElwee - Sr. Executive Recruiter - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
